content:
Prev: Team huddle Up: Hot Shots vs Blue Crew Next: Timeout for shoelaces

Sara scores run #3



She led off the third inning with a single, badly needed after the Hot Shots were shut out in inning two, and scored the first of four runs of the inning.
Taken Monday, March 15, 2004, 06:16:57pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 7.0Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/100s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 160mm (256mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 4000:35, 1:4:50:50:3:25:50+M, Crop, Sat shadows -30
